ruleContent.content:
<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>

});

pic=j[0].pic;
}
result=pic

</js>

  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

$.returnObject[0].content@js:
result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {
    var x = Array();
    var k, AA, BB, CC, DD, a, b, c, d;
    var S11 = 7,
    S12 = 12,
    S13 = 17,
    S14 = 22;
    var S21 = 5,
    S22 = 9,
    S23 = 14,
    S24 = 20;
    var S31 = 4,
    S32 = 11,
    S33 = 16,
    S34 = 23;
    var S41 = 6,
    S42 = 10,
    S43 = 15,
    S44 = 21;
    string = uTF8Encode(string);
    x = convertToWordArray(string);
    a = 0x67452301;
    b = 0xEFCDAB89;
    c = 0x98BADCFE;
    d = 0x10325476;
    for (k = 0; k < x.length; k += 16) {
        AA = a;
        BB = b;
        CC = c;
        DD = d;
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 0], S11, 0xD76AA478);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 1], S12, 0xE8C7B756);
        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 2], S13, 0x242070DB);

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/premier/)){
	result=java.getString(".read-content@html")
	}else{
		toc=java.getElements('.chaw_c li a')
		urls=[]
		toc.forEach(c=>{
			url="https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+String(c.attr("href"))
			if(!urls.includes(url)){
				urls.push(url)
				}
			})
		results=java.ajaxAll(urls)
		txt=""
		results.forEach(r=>{
			r=r.body()
			txt+=java.getString(".read-content@html",r)
			})
			result=txt
		}
result
</js>

<js>
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]
if(page!="1"){
	java.toast(`当前第${page}页`)
	}
result
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
-<js>
result=java.getElements(`#nr:has(h3 a:matches(${book.name}))`)
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]
if(result.length==1&&page=="1"){
	uri=result[0].select("h3 a").attr("href")
	toc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax("https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+uri))
	result=toc.select(".chaw_c li")
	result.sort((a,b)=>String(b).localeCompare(String(a)))
	java.log(result)
	}
result
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")

.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')

.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')

<js>
let id = result.match(/\{siteid:'(\d+)',bid:'(\d+)',cid:'(\d+)'\}/);
if (id) {
    let body = "siteid=" + id[1] + "&bid=" + id[2] + "&cid=" + id[3];
    let path = "novelsearch/chapter/transcode.html,";
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    java.ajax(String(source.bookSourceUrl + path + JSON.stringify(option)))
}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

jsLib: function method(result){ const { java, source, cookie } = this ;result=result.replace(/模擬/g,'模拟');return java.t2s(result)}

ruleContent.content:
<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");

/*

//第二种方法
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)/)[1];
var json=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(json);
if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + String(json).replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(/[;\)]+$/, "") + ")");
            //java.log(JSON.stringify(json));
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content;
        }

*/
</js>
html

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>
p@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getString("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say}

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')

.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@#info@p.3@text##最新更新：}} ⌚️{{@@#info@p.2@text##最后更新：}}
<js>result.replace(/20(\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{2}).*/,'$1')</js>

<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jm=java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name="client"]@content'));
if(jm.length()>1){
var conts = [],list=[];
code=result.match(/codeurl="(\d+)";/)[1];
data=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
datas=data.select("p[style*='text-indent']");
jm=String(jm).split(/[A-Z]+%/);
for(i=0;i<jm.length;i++){
	k=Math.ceil((i + 1) % parseInt(code));
	j=Math.ceil(jm[i] - k);
	conts[j]=datas[i];
	}
	for(i in conts){
		c=String(conts[i]).replace(/.*本章尚未读完,请.*一页继续阅读.*/g,'');
		list.push(c);
		list.join("\n");
		}
	}else{java.getString(".novelcontent@html")}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
h = "https://m.wpxs.cc/"
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));


c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

let res = JSON.parse(result).data.content function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>
$.data[*]

<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

books.forEach(w => {
  results.push(w.book_data[0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)
</js>$[*]

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
var i,n,url0,url1,now,all;
var url=[];
url0=String(baseUrl).replace(/(.*start=).*/,"$1");
url1=String(baseUrl).replace(/.*start=\d+(.*)/,"$1");
now=String(baseUrl).replace(/.*start=(\d+).*/,"$1");
all=String(baseUrl).replace(/.*serialnum=(\d+).*/,"$1");
n=parseInt(all)/10+1;
//url[0]=url0+"1"+url1;
if (n>now){
for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
 url[i]=url0+i+url1;
}
url
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
java.ajax(baseUrl+",{'webView': true}");	cookie=cookie.getCookie('https://m.scirym.club');
function menu(id,page){
res=java.post('https://m.scirym.club/novels/menu',JSON.stringify({
	'id':id,
	'page':page,
	'sort':'asc'
	}),{'cookie':cookie})
	return JSON.parse(res.body()).data
	}
	id = parseInt(java.get('book_id'));
	first = menu(id,1);
	all_list=first.list;
	for (var i=2;i<=first.total_page;i++){
		all_list.push.apply(all_list,menu(id,i).list)
}

all_list.map((item)=>{
	item.url = 'https://m.scirym.club/chapters/'+item.id
	})
	all_list
</js>

r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content

。@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
